ygData.subject: Level 27 and Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: I just got to Kunark last night (had to finish some Lambent. Still can t get a group on the Rathe to do MM for Gloves or the Gypsy lute) After a terrible time
ygData.messageBody:
I just got to Kunark last night (had to finish some Lambent. Still can't get a group on the Rathe to
do MM for Gloves or the Gypsy lute)

After a terrible time with the boat, I fell off the skiff. Swam to an island, took a boat to the
evil outpost and then the fun began.

Got to see several places in Kunark and the graphics are amazing.

Now to my question..

Suggestions on where to hunt? Fironia Vie seemed to have a lot of black, yellow and red that could
be charm fought. Or the Swamp of No hope and Warsilik Woods looked ok as well.

I know frontier Mt.'s is an option but that requires a group I think.

Any suggestions will be much appreciated.

Ranien Aeleroth
Bard of the 27th song
